team_a.name: Manager A (Scenario 0)
team_a.natural_language_description:
Manager: Manager A (Scenario 0)

Team Record: struggling 0-8 record, needs wins urgently
Playing Style: extremely conservative, prefers stable weekly floors over boom/bust players
Player Preferences: Values workhorse running backs with heavy workloads, QB-WR stacks from the same team
Decision Making: contrarian thinker who fades consensus rankings and popular narratives
Injury Approach: avoids any player with injury history or current concerns
Additional Notes: values targets and touches heavily, focuses on strength of schedule

team_b.name: Manager B (Scenario 0)
team_b.natural_language_description:
Manager: Manager B (Scenario 0)

Team Record: struggling 3-5 record, needs wins urgently
Playing Style: extremely conservative, prefers stable weekly floors over boom/bust players
Player Preferences: Values possession receivers with consistent targets, traditional pocket passers, proven veterans with track records, QB-WR stacks from the same team
Decision Making: considers expert consensus but makes independent evaluations
Injury Approach: actively targets injured players as buying opportunities
Additional Notes: prefers young ascending players
